title: Measuring the impact of AI on experienced open-source developer productivity
author: dheerajvs
aiHeadline: AI finally proves it can make developers slightly more productive, but only if they don't get distracted by cat videos.

title: Grok 4 Launch [video]
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: Grok 4 launches, and just like all the previous versions, it's going to revolutionize your life until you forget about it in a week.

title: German court rules Meta tracking technology violates European privacy laws
author: bundie
aiHeadline: German court says Meta's tracking is illegal, because apparently, even tech giants can't spy on people without consequences. Shocking!

title: Is Gemini 2.5 good at bounding boxes?
author: simedw
aiHeadline: Gemini 2.5 shows it's still trying to figure out where things are, because apparently, even AI can't tell a cat from a dog sometimes.

title: A Virginia public library is fighting off a takeover by private equity
author: sharkweek
aiHeadline: A Virginia library is resisting being taken over by private equity, proving that sometimes, the only thing worse than a for-profit institution is a non-profit one.
